requirement.title: HAL/uart
requirement.description: The HAL/uart module shall provide the following functionality: \begin{itemize} \item Configuation of the uart interfaces to different baud rates, parity configurations and number of stop bits \item Sending single bytes \item Sending buffers containing multiple bytes \item Signalling the reception of new bytes via callbacks \end{itemize} for all four UART-Interfaces.
